abstract: Facebook could be the next Google, whose shares now trade at more than six times their offering price, but it could also suffer the fate of Zynga, Groupon and other start-ups that came out of the gate strong, then quickly fell back.
snippet: Facebook could be the next Google, whose shares now trade at more than six times their offering price, but it could also suffer the fate of Zynga, Groupon and other start-ups that came out of the gate strong, then quickly fell back.

headline.main: For Average Investors, Long Odds on a Big Facebook Payday
